And Moses<S>4872</S> gathered<S>6950</S> all the congregation<S>5712</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> together<S>6950</S>, and said<S>559</S> unto them, These are the words<S>1697</S> which the LORD<S>3068</S> hath commanded<S>6680</S>, that ye should do<S>6213</S> them.
Six<S>8337</S> days<S>3117</S> shall work<S>4399</S> be done<S>6213</S>, but on the seventh<S>7637</S> day<S>3117</S> there shall be to you an holy day<S>6944</S>, a sabbath<S>7676</S> of rest<S>7677</S> to the LORD<S>3068</S>: whosoever doeth<S>6213</S> work<S>4399</S> therein shall be put to death<S>4191</S>. <sup>an: Heb. holiness</sup>
Ye shall kindle<S>1197</S> no fire<S>784</S> throughout your habitations<S>4186</S> upon the sabbath<S>7676</S> day<S>3117</S>.
And Moses<S>4872</S> spake<S>559</S> unto all the congregation<S>5712</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, saying<S>559</S>, This is the thing<S>1697</S> which the LORD<S>3068</S> commanded<S>6680</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
Take<S>3947</S> ye from among you an offering<S>8641</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>: whosoever<S>3605</S> is of a willing<S>5081</S> heart<S>3820</S>, let him bring<S>935</S> it, an offering<S>8641</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>; gold<S>2091</S>, and silver<S>3701</S>, and brass<S>5178</S>,
And blue<S>8504</S>, and purple<S>713</S>, and scarlet<S>8144</S> <S>8438</S>, and fine linen<S>8336</S>, and goats'<S>5795</S> hair,
And rams'<S>352</S> skins<S>5785</S> dyed red<S>119</S>, and badgers'<S>8476</S> skins<S>5785</S>, and shittim<S>7848</S> wood<S>6086</S>,
And oil<S>8081</S> for the light<S>3974</S>, and spices<S>1314</S> for anointing<S>4888</S> oil<S>8081</S>, and for the sweet<S>5561</S> incense<S>7004</S>,
And onyx<S>7718</S> stones<S>68</S>, and stones<S>68</S> to be set<S>4394</S> for the ephod<S>646</S>, and for the breastplate<S>2833</S>.
And every wise<S>2450</S> hearted<S>3820</S> among you shall come<S>935</S>, and make<S>6213</S> all that the LORD<S>3068</S> hath commanded<S>6680</S>;
The tabernacle<S>4908</S>, his tent<S>168</S>, and his covering<S>4372</S>, his taches<S>7165</S>, and his boards<S>7175</S>, his bars<S>1280</S>, his pillars<S>5982</S>, and his sockets<S>134</S>,
The ark<S>727</S>, and the staves<S>905</S> thereof, with the mercy seat<S>3727</S>, and the vail<S>6532</S> of the covering<S>4539</S>,
The table<S>7979</S>, and his staves<S>905</S>, and all his vessels<S>3627</S>, and the shewbread<S>6440</S> <S>3899</S>,
The candlestick<S>4501</S> also for the light<S>3974</S>, and his furniture<S>3627</S>, and his lamps<S>5216</S>, with the oil<S>8081</S> for the light<S>3974</S>,
And the incense<S>7004</S> altar<S>4196</S>, and his staves<S>905</S>, and the anointing<S>4888</S> oil<S>8081</S>, and the sweet<S>5561</S> incense<S>7004</S>, and the hanging<S>4539</S> for the door at the entering in<S>6607</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S>,
The altar<S>4196</S> of burnt offering<S>5930</S>, with his brasen<S>5178</S> grate<S>4345</S>, his staves<S>905</S>, and all his vessels<S>3627</S>, the laver<S>3595</S> and his foot<S>3653</S>,
The hangings<S>7050</S> of the court<S>2691</S>, his pillars<S>5982</S>, and their sockets<S>134</S>, and the hanging<S>4539</S> for the door<S>8179</S> of the court<S>2691</S>,
The pins<S>3489</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S>, and the pins<S>3489</S> of the court<S>2691</S>, and their cords<S>4340</S>,
The cloths<S>899</S> of service<S>8278</S>, to do service<S>8334</S> in the holy<S>6944</S> place, the holy<S>6944</S> garments<S>899</S> for Aaron<S>175</S> the priest<S>3548</S>, and the garments<S>899</S> of his sons<S>1121</S>, to minister in the priest's office<S>3547</S>.
And all the congregation<S>5712</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> departed<S>3318</S> from the presence<S>6440</S> of Moses<S>4872</S>.
And they came<S>935</S>, every one<S>376</S> whose<S>834</S> heart<S>3820</S> stirred him up<S>5375</S>, and every one whom his spirit<S>7307</S> made willing<S>5068</S>, and they brought<S>935</S> the LORD'S<S>3068</S> offering<S>8641</S> to the work<S>4399</S> of the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>, and for all his service<S>5656</S>, and for the holy<S>6944</S> garments<S>899</S>.
And they came<S>935</S>, both<S>5921</S> men<S>582</S> and women<S>802</S>, as many as<S>3605</S> were willing<S>5081</S> hearted<S>3820</S>, and brought<S>935</S> bracelets<S>2397</S>, and earrings<S>5141</S>, and rings<S>2885</S>, and tablets<S>3558</S>, all jewels<S>3627</S> of gold<S>2091</S>: and every man<S>376</S> that offered<S>5130</S> offered an offering<S>8573</S> of gold<S>2091</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>.
And every man<S>376</S>, with whom was found<S>4672</S> blue<S>8504</S>, and purple<S>713</S>, and scarlet<S>8144</S> <S>8438</S>, and fine linen<S>8336</S>, and goats'<S>5795</S> hair, and red<S>119</S> skins<S>5785</S> of rams<S>352</S>, and badgers'<S>8476</S> skins<S>5785</S>, brought<S>935</S> them.
Every one that did offer<S>7311</S> an offering<S>8641</S> of silver<S>3701</S> and brass<S>5178</S> brought<S>935</S> the LORD'S<S>3068</S> offering<S>8641</S>: and every man, with whom was found<S>4672</S> shittim<S>7848</S> wood<S>6086</S> for any work<S>4399</S> of the service<S>5656</S>, brought<S>935</S> it.
And all the women<S>802</S> that were wise<S>2450</S> hearted<S>3820</S> did spin<S>2901</S> with their hands<S>3027</S>, and brought<S>935</S> that which they had spun<S>4299</S>, both of blue<S>8504</S>, and of purple<S>713</S>, and of scarlet<S>8144</S> <S>8438</S>, and of fine linen<S>8336</S>.
And all the women<S>802</S> whose heart<S>3820</S> stirred<S>5375</S> them up in wisdom<S>2451</S> spun<S>2901</S> goats'<S>5795</S> hair.
And the rulers<S>5387</S> brought<S>935</S> onyx<S>7718</S> stones<S>68</S>, and stones<S>68</S> to be set<S>4394</S>, for the ephod<S>646</S>, and for the breastplate<S>2833</S>;
And spice<S>1314</S>, and oil<S>8081</S> for the light<S>3974</S>, and for the anointing<S>4888</S> oil<S>8081</S>, and for the sweet<S>5561</S> incense<S>7004</S>.
The children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> brought<S>935</S> a willing offering<S>5071</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>, every man<S>376</S> and woman<S>802</S>, whose<S>834</S> heart<S>3820</S> made them willing<S>5068</S> to bring<S>935</S> for all manner of work<S>4399</S>, which the LORD<S>3068</S> had commanded<S>6680</S> to be made<S>6213</S> by the hand<S>3027</S> of Moses<S>4872</S>.
And Moses<S>4872</S> said<S>559</S> unto the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, See<S>7200</S>, the LORD<S>3068</S> hath called<S>7121</S> by name<S>8034</S> Bezaleel<S>1212</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Uri<S>221</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Hur<S>2354</S>, of the tribe<S>4294</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>;
And he hath filled<S>4390</S> him with the spirit<S>7307</S> of God<S>430</S>, in wisdom<S>2451</S>, in understanding<S>8394</S>, and in knowledge<S>1847</S>, and in all manner of workmanship<S>4399</S>;
And to devise<S>2803</S> curious works<S>4284</S>, to work<S>6213</S> in gold<S>2091</S>, and in silver<S>3701</S>, and in brass<S>5178</S>,
And in the cutting<S>2799</S> of stones<S>68</S>, to set<S>4390</S> them, and in carving<S>2799</S> of wood<S>6086</S>, to make<S>6213</S> any manner of cunning<S>4284</S> work<S>4399</S>.
And he hath put<S>5414</S> in his heart<S>3820</S> that he may teach<S>3384</S>, both he, and Aholiab<S>171</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Ahisamach<S>294</S>, of the tribe<S>4294</S> of Dan<S>1835</S>.
Them hath he filled<S>4390</S> with wisdom<S>2451</S> of heart<S>3820</S>, to work<S>6213</S> all manner of work<S>4399</S>, of the engraver<S>2796</S>, and of the cunning workman<S>2803</S>, and of the embroiderer<S>7551</S>, in blue<S>8504</S>, and in purple<S>713</S>, in scarlet<S>8144</S> <S>8438</S>, and in fine linen<S>8336</S>, and of the weaver<S>707</S>, even of them that do<S>6213</S> any<S>3605</S> work<S>4399</S>, and of those that devise<S>2803</S> cunning work<S>4284</S>.
